description: Curated LCI data for aluminium production. Contains high-level processes for quick comparison and granular unit processes for custom project modeling.

processes.name: Primary Aluminium Ingot (EU)
processes.description: Cradle-to-gate production of 1kg of primary aluminium ingot via Hall-HÃ©roult process. Use for Quick Compare.
processes.source_citation: Aggregated from European Aluminium & ELCD 3.2. gCO2_per_kg is for direct process emissions (e.g., anode consumption). Grid energy impact is calculated separately by the API.

processes.name: Recycled Aluminium Ingot (EU)
processes.description: Cradle-to-gate production of 1kg of recycled (secondary) aluminium ingot from scrap. Use for Quick Compare.
processes.source_citation: Based on 95% energy savings principle vs primary (IEA/European Aluminium). gCO2_per_kg for direct remelting emissions.

processes.name: Unit Process: Electrolytic Smelting
processes.description: Unit process for converting alumina to 1kg of liquid aluminium. The most energy-intensive step.
processes.source_citation: Disaggregated from ELCD 3.2 data. Assumes transport is handled in raw material acquisition.

processes.name: Unit Process: Aluminium Hot Rolling
processes.description: Unit process for hot rolling 1kg of aluminium ingot into sheet or plate.
processes.source_citation: Based on industry averages for forming processes.

processes.name: Unit Process: Aluminium Extrusion
processes.description: Unit process for extruding 1kg of aluminium billet into a profile.
processes.source_citation: Based on industry averages for forming processes.

processes.name: End-of-Life: Collection & Recycling
processes.description: Process for collecting, sorting, and processing 1kg of post-consumer aluminium scrap.
processes.source_citation: Illustrative data based on European Aluminium circularity reports. Defines the yield of the EoL pathway.
